info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 20 at 9:41AM CDT until July 22 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Twin Cities/Chanhassen MN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...
Minnesota River at Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties.
.Recent rises in river stages will begin to level off today and begin a slow decline. Additional rain chances this week may lead to another short term rise across the area's rivers but widespread flooding doesn't appear likely at this time.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cottonwood River above Springfield.
* WHEN...Until late Monday night.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 AM CDT Sunday, the stage was 24.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 930 AM CDT Sunday was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.6 feet Sunday, July 27. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 24.0 feet on 04/26/1994.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY NIGHT
